message: I suggest a fair split considering our different inflation rates. You get $4500, I get $5500 to compensate for my higher inflation rate of 10%.
Let's split the money evenly at $5000 each. This way, we both face our respective inflation rates fairly on an equal share.

Given that we're now in round 3, my inflation rate of 10% has impacted me more than your 5% rate. This split of $5800/$4200 fairly compensates for our different inflation rates and the time that has passed. Let's agree and not lose more value to inflation.
I understand the impact of inflation on both sides. I propose $4800 for me and $5200 for you. This recognizes your higher inflation rate while keeping the split closer to even.
